summary_promot:
"You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or strategy guide.

"
        "Your task is to write a short, clear, and informative **English summary** of the image.
"
        "Do **not** speculate beyond what is explicitly visible in the image."
img_summary: The image shows a crafting menu from a video game, where the player can craft armor. The highlighted item is "Serpentscale Bracers," classified as "Uncommon." These bracers provide 7 defense and 3 poison resistance. They also have a special ability called "Wave-Rider," which massively reduces stamina cost when in water. The crafting requirements include 25 Yarn and 1732 Will, with the player having 720 Will available. The player can hold the "A" button to craft the item. On the right side, there is a character with a mask and armor, along with various stats displayed. A dialogue at the bottom reads, "I recognize you. You're no noble."
